module.name: default_setting_association
module.changes:
Default_chamfer mapping updated
Default_draft_angle mapping updated
Default_edge_round mapping updated
Default_fillet mapping updated
Default_shape_property mapping updated
Default_thickness mapping updated
Bug 5554 Various ARM-MIM mapping errors in actual AP242ed2-CD build - fixed minor mapping issues in reference path

purpose.p: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the representation of default shape properties.

inscope.li: items within the scope of application module Shape property assignment, ISO/TS 10303-1032;
items within the scope of application module Value with unit extension, ISO/TS 10303-1753.

aa.refpath: property_definition <- property_definition_representation.definition property_definition_representation.used_representation -> representation {representation.name = 'default chamfer'} representation.items[i] -> representation_item {representation_item.name = 'offset value'} representation_item => measure_representation_item {measure_representation_item <= measure_with_unit => length_measure_with_unit}

property_definition <- property_definition_representation.definition property_definition_representation.used_representation -> representation {representation.name = 'default draft angle'} representation.items[i] -> representation_item {representation_item.name = 'draft angle value'} representation_item => measure_representation_item {measure_representation_item <= measure_with_unit => plane_angle_measure_with_unit}

property_definition <- property_definition_representation.definition property_definition_representation.used_representation -> representation {representation.name = 'default edge round'} representation.items[i] -> representation_item {representation_item.name = 'radius value'} representation_item => measure_representation_item {measure_representation_item <= measure_with_unit => length_measure_with_unit}

property_definition <- property_definition_representation.definition property_definition_representation.used_representation -> representation {representation.name = 'default fillet'} representation.items[i] -> representation_item {representation_item.name = 'radius value'} representation_item => measure_representation_item {measure_representation_item <= measure_with_unit => length_measure_with_unit}

property_definition <- property_definition_representation.definition property_definition_representation.used_representation -> representation {representation.name = 'default thickness'} representation.items[i] -> representation_item {representation_item.name = 'thickness value'} representation_item => measure_representation_item {measure_representation_item <= measure_with_unit => length_measure_with_unit}

property_definition <- property_definition_representation.definition property_definition_representation.used_representation -> representation {representation.name = 'default thickness'} representation.items[i] -> representation_item {representation_item.name = 'parameter name'} representation_item => descriptive_representation_item descriptive_representation_item.description
